name: LankaSoft Technologies
about: LankaSoft Technologies is a pioneer in software development in Sri Lanka, known for its innovative solutions in cloud computing and enterprise software.

name: Innovate Sri Lanka
about: Innovate Sri Lanka provides cutting-edge technology solutions with a focus on AI and machine learning for local and international clients.

name: CeylonTech Solutions
about: CeylonTech Solutions is renowned for its robust telecom solutions and services that cater to the Asian market.

name: Colombo IT Ventures
about: Colombo IT Ventures specializes in digital transformation and IT consulting services to propel businesses into the digital age.

name: SocialMedia Pros
about: SocialMedia Pros offers tailored digital marketing and social media strategies to enhance online presence and engagement.

name: Lanka Messaging Solutions
about: Lanka Messaging Solutions provides innovative messaging and communication solutions for the Sri Lankan market.

name: Island Media Works
about: Island Media Works specializes in media production and advertising, offering comprehensive services from production to placement.

name: Video Solutions Lanka
about: Video Solutions Lanka is a leader in video production and editing services, providing high-quality content for the entertainment and corporate sectors.

name: Lanka CodeCraft
about: Lanka CodeCraft is a software development company that delivers bespoke solutions for global and local markets, specializing in web and mobile applications.
